comments.html: Nice to hear I got this one right in the NSF blog post ;) I was a bit skeptical and thinking along the lines of "surely they must be doing this the right way by now" but obviously not...
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Another caveat: after SSO, the control plane assumes a state in the ASICs which may not be correct, leading to stale forwarding entries which don’t get removed until a reload of the whole device. We had quite some failed attempts on ISSU with NX-OS, resulting in strange forwarding errors which could only be solved through a reload…
comments.name: Arne
